name: Block Color Fill
description:
Drag the block to fit them in the row or column, after the block clearing, you will get scores

HOW TO PLAY：
- Drag the blocks to move them.
- Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
- Blocks can't be rotated.
- Don't worry! No time limits!

Features：
-Addictive puzzle game
- It is all FREE!
- Try to clear all blocks, you will get a lot of bonus!
- Easy to learn and play, and pleasurable game for all ages!
- The more blocks you popping, the more score you will get.
